summary: In medieval France, the Devil intervenes when one of his two envoys, sent to seduce and deceive mortals, falls instead for a victim.
cast: Arletty|Marie Déa|Fernand Ledoux|Alain Cuny|Pierre Labry|Jean d'Yd|Roger Blin|Gabriel Gabrio|Marcel Herrand|Jules Berry|Janine Berry|Claudye Carter|François Chaumette|Jean Darnel|Arsenio Freignac|Guy Henry|Robert Hébert|Robert Le Béal|Marie-Thérèse Moissel|Piéral|Alain Resnais|Madeleine Rousset|Georges Sellier|Simone Signoret
title: Los visitantes de la noche
